channel.title: Domain Model on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Domain Model on Mark Needham

item.title: Internal/External Domain Models
item.description: One of the underlying characteristic of most of the projects I have worked on is that we have defined our own domain model. On my current project due to the fact that most of the logic in the system is being handled through other services we decided to use WCF messages as the domain model, meaning that our domain model is being defined externally by the team defining the message contracts.
